risk.title: Risk Warning
risk.text: When pledging DOWS synthetic assets, a "debt" is generated. The "debt" is the amount of xUSD they initially minted. Next, the debt will fluctuate with the gains and losses of other synthetic asset holders. When the synthetic assets held by someone increase in value, that part of the proceeds will come from the debts of all DOWS holders in proportion. Each holder must pay their debts to unlock their pledged DOWS.

mortgage.title: Stake DOWS rewards
mortgage.text: DOWS mortgagor can get 3 kinds of rewards: 1. Exchange fee reward; 2. Stakling reward; 3. Loan pool income

rate.title: Mortgage rate
rate.text: All synthetic assets are supported by the mortgaged DOWS. The minimum mortgage rate is 800%. If the mortgage rate is lower than the requirement, you will not be able to get rewards and redeem DOWS. You can receive multiple rewards every week if the mortgage rate is met.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.text: Shadows is a decentralized synthetic asset issuance agreement, transaction agreement, and loan agreement built on Polkadot. The value of these synthetic assets is guaranteed by DOWS.

synthesis.title: Synthesis
synthesis.text: Synthetic assets meet our diverse needs. For users with hedging needs, compared with the U.S. dollar, they need stable coins (USDT, dUSD, xUSD, etc., belonging to synthetic assets) on the blockchain to facilitate the flow of funds

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.text: Trade your synthetic assets and xUSD.

liquidity.title: Liquidity
liquidity.text: Liquidity measures how easy it is to convert assets into cash quickly and without loss. The easier the conversion, the better the liquidity of the asset. In the world of cryptocurrency trading, one of the promoters of liquidity is the deposit of many different limit orders

destroy.title: Destroy
destroy.text: Destroy xUSD to unlock your pledged DOWS. This will increase your mortgage rate and reduce your debt, allowing you to transfer DOWS not in custody

reward.title: Reward
reward.text: Mortgage DOWS to cast synthetic assets, trade synthetic assets, and get rewards every week
